functionDecorators.name: approveStrategy
functionDecorators.description: Approve the given address as a Strategy for a want. The Strategist can freely switch between approved stratgies for a token.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Get the balance of the given tokens' current strategy of that token.

functionDecorators.name: earn
functionDecorators.description: Deposit given token to strategy, converting it to the strategies' want first (if required). Only the associated vault, or permissioned actors can call this function (keeper, strategist, governance).

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: Token to deposit (will be converted to want by converter). If no converter is registered, the transaction will revert.

functionDecorators.name: inCaseStrategyTokenGetStuck
functionDecorators.description: Transfer an amount of the specified token from the controller to the sender.Token balance are never meant to exist in the controller, this is purely a safeguard.

functionDecorators.name: inCaseTokensGetStuck
functionDecorators.description: Transfer an amount of the specified token from the controller to the sender.Token balance are never meant to exist in the controller, this is purely a safeguard.

parameterDecorators.name: _governance
parameterDecorators.description: Can take any permissioned action within the Controller, with the exception of Vault helper functions.

parameterDecorators.name: _strategist
parameterDecorators.description: Can configure new Vaults, choose strategies among those approved by governance, and call operations involving non-core tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _keeper
parameterDecorators.description: An extra address that can call earn() to deposit tokens from a Sett into the associated active Strategy. Designed for use by a trusted bot in leiu of having this function publically callable.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewards
parameterDecorators.description: The recipient of standard fees (such as performance and withdrawal fees) from Strategies.

functionDecorators.name: revokeStrategy
functionDecorators.description: Revoke approval for the given address as a Strategy for a want.

functionDecorators.name: setConverter
functionDecorators.description: Set the contract used to convert between two given assets.

functionDecorators.name: setGovernance
functionDecorators.description: Change governance addressCan only be changed by governance itself.

functionDecorators.name: setKeeper
functionDecorators.description: Change keeper addressCan only be changed by governance itself.

functionDecorators.name: setOneSplit
functionDecorators.description: Change the oneSplit contract, which is used in conversion of non-core strategy rewards.

functionDecorators.name: setRewards
functionDecorators.description: Change the recipient of rewards for standard fees from Strategies.

functionDecorators.name: setStrategist
functionDecorators.description: Change strategist addressCan only be changed by governance itself.

functionDecorators.name: setStrategy
functionDecorators.description: Migrate assets from existing strategy to a new strategy.The new strategy must have been previously approved by governance.Strategist or governance can freely switch between approved strategies.

functionDecorators.name: setVault
functionDecorators.description: Set the Vault (aka Sett) for a given wantThe vault can only be set once.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Wtihdraw a given token from it's corresponding strategyOnly the associated vault can call, in response to a user withdrawal request.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawAll
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw the entire balance of a token from that tokens' current strategy.Does not trigger a withdrawal fee.Entire balance will be sent to corresponding Sett.
